Career Profile

Results-oriented operations director. With 20 years of experience in managing technology teams and stimulating innovation to achieve business goals. A proven track record in developing and implementing technology and management strategies aimed at promoting a collaborative environment and responsibility to improve operations.

Looking for a technical director position to leverage my expertise in leadership and strategic planning.

Experiences

Head of Global Datacenters & Cloud Services

2017 - Present
Sodexo, Issy-les-Moulineaux

Management of infrastructure and operations for Sodexo countries by implementing a multimodal approach. Led the datacenter strategy by implementing an hybrid cloud approach and rationalized the datacenter locations. Ensured scalable, secure and high-performance infrastructure to support the organization’s global business needs. Drive innovation, manage large-scale projects and align the datacenter and cloud strategy with business objectives while ensuring compliance and operational excellence.

  • Management of multidiciplinary and international team (20 people).
  • Implemented hyperconverged datacenter blueprint, reducing datacenter surface by 30%.
  • Led the global virtualization strategy.
  • Led the RFP and transition to new Management Service Provider.
  • Management of budget, forecast and recharges (40M€).
  • Introduction of recycling in the procurement process.
  • Implemented Datadog and observability processes.
  • Implemented Tanium for endpoint management and increased patching conformity from 60% to 98%
  • Led the IT for IT developments for tools integration.
  • Implemented a global TCO model to link the recharges with the expenses.

Global Datacenter & Cloud Services Manager

2017 - 2020
Sodexo, Issy-les-Moulineaux

Responsible for the datacenter operations management team. Supervision of the daily operations, ensuring the availability and reliability of the infrastructures. Management of the management service provider and control of the SLA.

  • Implementation of Apptio for reinvoicing
  • Implementation of Dynamics 365 CRM for internal recharges

  • Implementation of Global Azure Products for Automation

Informations System Manager
